data.actual_result: It isn't highlighted and must be copy/pasted to follow the link, unless it has a slash at the end.
data.expected_result: The URL should be highlighted blue and clickable as a link. Even when it has no trailing slash.
data.short_description: IPv6 IP URLs are not recognized as URLs
data.steps_to_repro: - Enter an IPv6 address URL in the form of https://[fe80::1:1]
